RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAQAMAT raced off the pace on the inside up the backstretch, continued around the turn in the three path, launched a bid in upper stretch and gained ground quickly to pull clear late. SILVER MATT raced in the middle of the pack on the outside through the opening quarter of a mile, navigated the bend from the two path and improved position in the lane. BRION dueled on the outside early, led the way while saving ground around the turn and continued to battle in the stretch but was caught late. AWESOME ENOUGH chased the pace setter on the inside up the backstretch, began a bid from the three path coming around the bend and kept on to the wire. UNBRIDLED VICTOR raced in the middle of the pack on the inside through the opening stages, saved ground around the turn and finished evenly. CONSIDER ME reared up leaving the gate, settled in the middle of the pack on the inside for the run up the backstretch, came around the turn in the two path and showed no kick. ESTILO CLASICO trailed the field up the backstretch, continued around the bend in the three path and made no bid. ARMOR PIERCING dueled on the inside through the early going, dropped back to chase the leader from the two path around the bend and tired in the lane. BIKO raced off the pace on the outside up the backstretch, swung out to the four path coming around the turn and was empty from there.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KANT ELOPE dueled on the inside up the backstretch, continued to battle from the two path coming around the turn and kicked clear in the lane. SMARTASSET dueled on the outside through the opening quarter of a mile, continued to battle from the three path around the bend and could not go with the winner in the lane but chased that rival home. CLOUD PRINCESS raced off the pace on the inside early, came around the turn in the two path and improved position in the stretch. DOMINUS O'S ME hit the gate leaving it, recovered to chase the leader up the backstretch, navigated the turn from the three and four path and then weakened in the lane. J. P INDY raced off the pace on the outside through the opening stages, swung out to the four and five path coming around the turn and made no bid. RED HEAD LADY trailed the field throughout, saved ground around the bend and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Kant Elope
ENTRY.OWNER: Fraser, James A. and Jane N.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jane N. Fraser & James A. Fraser

ENTRY.NAME: Dominus O's Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARTSTEIN chased the leader on the outside up the backstretch, challenged from the three path coming around the turn, dueled in upper stretch and kicked clear. MOMENT IN THE DARK dueled on the inside up the backstretch, continued to battle from the two path coming around the bend, could not go with the winner in the final furlong and chased that rival home from there. SOL OF VAQUERO tracked the leader on the inside through the opening quarter of a mile, saved ground around the turn and kept on in the lane. SOMETHING ON TAP stalked the pace setters on the outside up the backstretch, came around the bend in the three path and kept on to the wire. REDDEN raced off the pace on the inside up the backstretch, saved ground around the turn and improved position in the stretch. RUNAWAY RUSSELL veered in leaving the gate, stalked the leader on the outside early, came around the turn in the three path and weakened in the lane. FORMYBOYS bumped with the horses to his outside leaving the gate, settled in the middle of the pack for the run up the backstretch, raced in the four path around the turn and faded in the stretch. WHY KENNY WHY bumped with the horses to his inside at the start, raced off the pace on the outside through the early going, continued around the turn in the three path and showed no kick. MY HOMBRE hopped up leaving the gate, recovered to duel on the outside up the backstretch, dropped back while racing in the two path around the bend and tired further in the lane. MY TICKET bumped repeatedly with the horses to either side at the break, trailed the field throughout, came around the turn in the four path and was never a factor.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considere d In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEENOFTHEBUCKEYE hopped up leaving the gate, raced in the middle of the pack on the outside up the backstretch, began a bid from the three path coming around the turn and kicked clear in the final furlong. DANES LAST SONG led the way up the backstretch, saved ground around the bend, was caught entering the stretch and chased on to the wire. MOBIL MEMORY chased the leader through the early going, navigated the turn from the two path and kept on in the lane. GHOSTLY REVIVAL raced at the back of the pack through the opening quarter of a mile, came around the turn in the three path and improved position in the stretch. MY TWO JAKES raced off the pace up the backstretch, began a bid from the three and four path coming around the bend and flattened out in the lane. WELLOILEDCAT trailed the field up the backstretch, raced in the two path around the turn and made no bid. MOST ADORABLE raced in the middle of the pack on the inside early, saved ground around the bend and faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Most Adorable
ENTRY.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Louis V. Ruberto Jr.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 21 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NEXT GENERATION bumped hard with the horses to both sides leaving the gate, raced off the pace up the backstretch, swung out to the five path to began a bid approaching the quarter pole, gained ground late and kicked clear. NEECHI bumped mildly with the horse to his outside at the start, settled in the middle of the pack off the rail for the run up the backstretch, swung out to the six path to began a bid entering the stretch and gained ground late from there. CHANEL SPIRIT bumped soundly with the horse to his inside at the break, recovered to stalk the leader on the outside through the opening quarter, challenged coming around the turn, entered the stretch in the five path, dueled in upper stretch and chased the winner home in the final furlong. THE MIRACLE KIUT tracked the pace setter on the inside through the early going, navigated the bend from the two and three path and was outkicked in the stretch. EMERSON JONES chased the leader on the outside up the backstretch, came around the bend in the three path and weakened in the lane. ANGEL WINGS raced in the middle of the pack between horses through the opening stages, continued around the turn in the two path and showed no kick. OUT FOR FUN bumped repeatedly with the horse to his outside leaving the gate, trailed the field up the backstretch, raced in the two path around the turn and never threateneed. LOFTY COWTOWN raced in the middle of the pack on the inside early, saved ground around the turn and faded from there. SHAKEURSKINNYLEGS bobbled slightly leaving the gate, recovered to lead the way up the backstretch, came around the turn in the two path and tired in the stretch. ANCHORWOMAN bumped slightly with the horse to her inside at the start, recovered to press the pace on the outside up the backstretch, came around the turn in the three and four path and tired in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Chanel Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR ENTERED TO BE CLAIMED FOR $25,000. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Sin ce November 21 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SO DIALED IN bumped with the horse to his outside at the start, recovered to lead the field up the backstretch, continued to show the way from the two path around the turn and held clear to the wire. GOOD ON YA tracked the leader on the inside up the backstretch, saved ground around the bend and chased the winner home in the stretch. BEVERLY PARK raced in the middle of the pack on the inside early, began a bid from the four path coming around the bend and kept on in the lane. BREEZY MONEY chased the leader on the outside up the backstretch, continued around the turn in the three path and was outkicked in the stretch. MOESTER bumped with the horse to his inside leaving the gate, was pinched back and raced off the pace on the rail through the opening stages, saved ground around the turn and never threatened. THRU THE VINE raced in the middle of the pack on the outside up the backstretch, came around the turn in the three path and made no bid. FLY HOME veered out leaving the gate, settled off the pace on the outside for the run up the backstretch, navigated the far turn from the four path and was empty in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Moester
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,block,off pace inside,svd gnd,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Joshua Radosevich Memorial S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 71. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR TWO-YEAR-OLDS (OHIO ACCREDITED). $50 to nominate. $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weight: 122 lbs. Non-winners of a s weepstakes allowed 2 lbs.; Non-winners of two races, 4 lbs.; Maidens, 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, December 18, 2023 by the usual time of closing. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHADOWY pressed the pace on the outside up the backstretch, raced in the two path around the turn and drew off in the lane. HEZA PISTOL raced off the pace on the inside up the backstretch, came around the turn in the three path, began a bid in upper stretch and gained ground late. LUST FOR LIFE led the way on the inside through the opening quarter, saved ground around the bend and gave way in the final furlong. VILLIAN veered out and bumped with the horse to her outside at the start, recovered to stalk the pace setter between horses up the backstretch, continued around the turn in the three path and kept on to the finish. COUNTEVERYBLESSING bumped with the horse to her inside leaving the gate, settled off the pace on the outside up the backstretch, swung out to the five path to began a bid approaching the quarter pole and was outkicked in the lane. REIGNING DREAM hopped up mildly leaving the gate, recovered to track the leader on the outside early, navigated the bend from the four path and weakened in the stretch. SOCIAL HISTORY raced in the middle of the pack up the backstretch, came around the turn in the two path and showed no kick. RIVERS OF DENIRO dropped back to trail well behind the field racing up the backstretch, continued around the bend in the four path and never threatened. C V DYNAMIC raced at the back of the pack through the opening stages, navigated the turn from the four path and made no bid. TWISTED JUSTICE chased the pace setters on the inside up the backstretch, saved ground around the bend and tired from there.

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & Brian Kahn

ENTRY.NAME: Social History
ENTRY.OWNER: Nelson Kathryn and Nelson Jim E

ENTRY.NAME: Lust for Life
ENTRY.OWNER: HMD Racing Stables LLC and Taste of Victory Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Rivers of Deniro
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Villian
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Hamm Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: veer,bmp brk,stalk btwn,3p,kept on, bled, vanned off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Bobbie Bricker Memorial S. MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 75. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD (OHIO ACCREDITED). $50 to nominate. Subscription of $263 to enter and $487 to start with $75,000 Guaranteed. Purse to be divided: 60% to the winner; 20% to second; 10% to third; 5% to fourth; 3% to fifth; 2% to sixth. Weights: Three-Year-Olds 123 lbs.; Older 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Sweepstakes at a mile or over in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; Two races other than maiden, claiming or starter at a mile or over in 2023, 4 lbs.; A race other than maiden, claiming or starter at a mile or over in 2023, 6 lbs. Starters to be named through the entry box Monday, December 18, 2023 by the usual time of closing. If more than eight (8) horses are entered this race will be run at One Mile and Seventy Yards. Trophy presented to the winning owner.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOBIL CHIC raced in the two path around the first turn, chased the leader on the inside up the backstretch, came around the far turn in the four path, challenged passing the quarter pole and drew off in the lane. NEAR PERFECT raced off the pace on the outside through the opening half mile, continued around the second turn still in the three path, launched a bid in upper stretch and gained ground late from there. AUNT BEE raced in the two path early, settled off the pace on the inside for the run up the backstretch, saved ground around the far bend and gained ground in late stretch. BOSSY LADY saved ground at the back of the pack around the first turn and up the backstretch, came around the far turn in the two and three path and improved position in the lane. EXPRESS FASHION raced in the two path around the first turn, continued up the backstretch in the middle of the pack on the inside, saved ground around the second turn and passed tiring horses between horses in the stretch. LUCKY PENNY ROSE raced at the back of the pack in the four path through the opening half mile, navigated the far turn from the five path and never threatened. IN TROUBLED WATERS angled out to race in the three path around the first bend, came up the backstretch in the middle of the pack on the outside, began a bid from the five path coming around the second turn and weakened in the final furlong. BETTER HALF raced in the two path early, led the way up the backstretch, dueled from the two path around the far bend and tired from there. SARAH JANE raced in the three path around the first turn, stalked the pace setter on the outside up the backstretch, began to drop back while racing in the four path around the far turn and continued to fade in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: In Troubled Waters
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Better Half
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
